backend/main.mo: Defines core domain types for tasks, users, transactions, withdrawals, ads, ratings, and activity logs in the backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a withdrawal-flow requirement to relevant frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files including pages, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/.nojekyll: Empty marker file to disable Jekyll processing on static hosts.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that redirects unknown paths to the root while preserving the original URL in sessionStorage.
frontend/scripts/README.md: Documentation explaining the draft URL verification script’s purpose and usage.
frontend/scripts/verify-draft-url.exampl: Example environment configuration for running the draft URL verification script.
frontend/scripts/verify-draft-url.mjs: Node script that verifies deployed draft URLs by checking root HTML, status codes, and SPA deep-link behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with role‑based routing and renders the main app shell after authentication.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdInterstiti: Displays an interstitial ad dialog with a countdown and content fetched by ad type.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdPlacementB: Shows an ad placement banner fetched by ad type and renders its content if available.
Provides the main app layout with role‑based navigation, user menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/tasks/PostedByLa: Fetches and displays the posting user's name for a task, falling back to a truncated principal.
frontend/src/components/tasks/StatusBadg: Maps task status values to styled badges with readable labels.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskCard.t: Displays a task summary card with status, metadata, provider info, and an accept button for students.
frontend/src/components/transactions/Tra: Renders a table of transaction records with formatted dates, amounts, and type indicators.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user, profile, role, and other backend data with cache invalidation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining light and dark theme variables and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/ActivityLogsPag: Admin page showing a table of system activity logs with role checks and formatted entries.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard displaying stats for tasks, verifications, withdrawals, and commission earnings.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdsSettingsPage: Admin interface for viewing and editing ad placements, content, and frequency with role protection.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AllUsersPage.ts: Admin-only page placeholder for managing and viewing all registered users.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/CommissionEarni: Admin-only page outlining commission earnings information with placeholder analytics.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/SystemStatsPage: Admin-only page that blocks non-admins and displays a placeholder system statistics card.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/TaskCompletionP: Shows tasks with submitted proof and lets admins approve or reject them, triggering payment distribution.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/TaskModerationP: Lists tasks awaiting admin approval and allows approving pending submissions.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/VerificationRev: Displays pending student verification requests with document links and approve/reject actions.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/WithdrawalReque: Shows pending withdrawal requests and lets admins approve or reject them with wallet adjustments.
Landing page for Internet Identity login and post-login profile setup with role selection.
frontend/src/pages/Provider/CreateTaskPa: Form page that lets providers create a new task, validates deposit balance, and submits task creation.
frontend/src/pages/Provider/ProviderDash: Provider dashboard showing deposit stats, task summaries, transaction history, and wallet deposit actions.
frontend/src/pages/Student/MyTasksPage.t: Displays a student's active and completed tasks with tabbed navigation.
frontend/src/pages/Student/StudentDashbo: Student dashboard listing stats, ads, and available tasks to accept.
frontend/src/pages/Student/StudentProfil: Profile page allowing students to view and update personal info and see wallet balance and role.
frontend/src/pages/Student/TransactionHi: Page that loads and displays the user's transaction history.
frontend/src/pages/Student/WalletPage.ts: Wallet page showing balance, withdrawal form with validation, and recent transaction history using query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/Tasks/TaskDetailsPage: Task detail view enabling acceptance, proof upload, and admin review actions with file handling and status logic.
frontend/src/utils/formatInr.ts: Utility functions to format INR amounts and convert bigint values to numbers for UI use.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing wallet-related features, pending requirements, and architectural notes.
